channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Le Roborock Saros Z70 et son surprenant bras articulé aspire 33 % de son prix chez Boulanger
item.description: Ce Roborock Saros Z70 se démarque avec ce surprenant bras articulé, mais c'est loin d'être la seule qualité de ce robot aspirateur puisqu'il possède une puissance d'aspiration colossale de 22 000 Pa. Retrouvez-le chez Boulanger pour 1 199 euros au lieu de 1 799 euros.

item.title: I tested Doogee's V Max LR - a rugged phone that's identical to the V Max Play with one big difference that also makes it cheaper
item.description: The Doogee V Max LR is a monster rugged phone built for those in the construction industry.

item.title: Coinbase starts onboarding users again in India, plans for fiat on-ramp next year
item.description: Coinbase is exploring expansion into India with a staggered relaunch and hiring for different roles.

item.title: Can you survive our The Walking Dead quiz? 30 questions stand between you and Alexandria
item.description: Are you a survivor or are you just a walker? Let's find out with this 30-question The Walking Dead quiz.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, December 8 (game #1414)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, December 8 (game #911)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Monday, December 8 (game #645)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: The Boys season 5 trailer reveals when the hit Prime Video show's final chapter will be released – and Jared Padalecki's mystery character
item.description: The Boys' fifth and final season finally has a release date and a first trailer.

item.title: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth addresses Venezuelan attack in SNL cold open
item.description: Weekend Update host Colin Jost returns as dude-bro Secretary of War Pete Hegseth.

item.title: ‘The Boys’ Will Supe It Up One Last Time in April 2026
item.description: Prepare to say goodbye or 'RIP' to Butcher, Homelander, and the rest of the gang when 'The Boys' ends next spring.

item.title: OpenAI says it’s turned off app suggestions that look like ads
item.description: While OpenAI continues to insist that there are currently no ads — or tests for advertising — live in ChatGPT, the company’s chief research officer also acknowledged that the company “fell short” with recent promotional messages.

item.title: J’ai roulé 600 km au volant d’une BYD électrique à moins de 20 000 € : voici comment s’est passé ce long voyage en Dolphin Surf
item.description: On parle beaucoup des voitures électriques à moins de 20 000 euros, mais qu'en est-il dans la vraie vie ? Sont-elles de simples objets marketing ou des propositions viables ? Peut-on partir en week-end quand on a 220 km d'autonomie ? Pour le savoir, je suis parti voir la mer au volant de la moins chère des BYD Dolphin Surf. Récit d'un voyage de 600 km. ...

item.title: A very human vision for going all-in on AI
item.description: It's easy to think about AI as a sort of existential battle between human and machine. Maybe it will be, someday, in a Skynet sort of way. But there are also lots of people trying to figure out how to use AI not as a replacement for human creativity and thinking but as a tool […]

item.title: Threats to watch this year: from data theft and extortion to EDR killers
item.description: Threat actors have shifted behaviors, refined their tooling and adapted tactics; here's what you need to know.

item.title: I reviewed Marshall’s mid-sized Bluetooth speaker and its stereo sound blew me away
item.description: The Marshall Middleton II boasts excellent sound quality, a classy design, and plenty of battery life, but almost fittingly, it can sometimes feel stuck in the middle.

item.title: 12 perfect gifts for passionate home cooks, curated by a kitchen tech editor
item.description: The kitchen tools and gadgets they didn't know they always wanted.

item.title: 5 features that are still missing from iOS 26 – and it's not just the Siri update
item.description: We probably won't get iOS 27 until late 2026, but there's lots still to come in iOS 26 before that.

item.title: The anime-themed Starforge Systems Frieren PC might be one of the prettiest systems I've ever seen - and the performance is almost as powerful as the elf mage herself
item.description: It might not last as long as an ageless magical elf, but the Starforge Frieren PC is nonetheless a future-proof powerhouse system with a truly excellent design for fans of the series.

item.title: Hisense HT Saturn : le système Home Cinema sans fil qui tient tête à Sony et Samsung retire 200 € de son prix
item.description: Une bonne barre de son, ce n’est pas seulement du volume : c’est la capacité d’ouvrir l’espace, de faire respirer un film, d’ajouter du relief à chaque impact. La Hisense HT Saturn, conçue avec Devialet, joue dans cette cour avec une aisance presque insolente. Boulanger fait même une belle ristourne qui fait passer son prix de 1 490 euros à 1 290 euros. ...
